remarks:
A variable not free remains so after substitution with a distinct variable (closed form of ~ nfsb4 ).  (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2016.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 11-May-2018.) 

---

 A variable not free remains so after substitution with a distinct variable (closed form of ~ hbsb4 ).  (Contributed by NM, 7-Apr-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2016.)  (Proof rewritten by Jim Kingdon, 9-May-2018.)
statement: nfsb4t $p |- ( A. x F/ z ph -> ( -. A. z z = y -> F/ z [ y / x ] ph ) ) $.
